author: AP
title: Chelsea's Willian cautious about resuming even without fans
description: Chelsea winger Willian says the Premier League has to be careful about deciding to resume even without fans
content:
SAO PAOLO (AP) — Chelsea winger Willian is relishing the Premier League resuming, with some reservations during the coronavirus pandemic.
“If we restart playing without fans but there’s contact on the pitch and maybe we can spread the virus between us,” Will… [+4568 chars]
